title: Googliath | Today, Explained in 10
description:
Australia just reined in Google. Dozens of other countries want in on the action. The latest season of Land of the Giants explains how two grad students, Sergey Brin and Larry Page, turned a search engine into what might be the most powerful company in history.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: Googliath | Today, Explained in 10
itunes:author: Vox
itunes:subtitle: Recode’s Shirin Ghaffary and tech journalist Alex Kantrowitz explain Google’s origins in the Computer Science department of Stanford University.
